Package it.polimi.ingsw.client.controller

Class CliController

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.client.controller.CliController
All Implemented Interfaces:
ClientController
public class CliController extends Object implements ClientController
Controller of the client and the CLI

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    CliController()
    Create a CliController and add the CLI to the observers of the virtualModel
